content:
Sure, here is some information on the revenues and customers for each of the companies I mentioned earlier:

1. Corning: Corning reported net sales of $12.2 billion USD in 2020. In the automotive glass industry, Corning's major customers include BMW, Mercedes-Benz, and Toyota.
2. Xinyi Glass: Xinyi Glass reported revenue of HKD 27.6 billion (approx. $3.6 billion USD) in 2020. Xinyi's major customers in the automotive glass industry include BMW, General Motors, and Volkswagen.
3. Asahi Glass Co. (AGC): AGC reported revenue of ¥1.5 trillion (approx. $14.1 billion USD) in fiscal year 2020. AGC's major customers in the automotive glass industry include Toyota, Honda, and Volkswagen.
4. PPG Industries: PPG Industries reported net sales of $13.8 billion USD in 2020. PPG's major customers in the automotive glass industry include General Motors, Ford, and BMW.
5. Central Glass: Central Glass reported revenue of ¥386.7 billion (approx. $3.6 billion USD) in fiscal year 2020. Central Glass's major customers in the automotive glass industry include Toyota, Honda, and Nissan.

Please note that these revenue figures and customer information may be subject to change and may not reflect the most up-to-date information.
